entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Adding GestureRecognizer To Editor prevents focus on Android & iOS #27831
  • [Label] Certain style attributes not applied when using Label.FormattedText #27828
  • Random error (System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException (0x8001010E)) when executing or trying to hot reload MAUI Blazor Hybrid Application #27827

Closed

  • App crashes in the release mode on Android after updating to MAUI 9.0.40 #27832
  • Excessive Looping Due to Missing Longitude Validation in Location.shared.cs #27774
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [iOS]Fix Page BackgroundImageSource scaling #27829
    community ✨

Merged

  • [Essentials] Longitude Validation #27784
    t/breaking 💥, area-essentials, .NET 9 SR5

Updated

  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #27816
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
  • Fix concurrency issues and leak reliability #27815
  • Update SkiaSharp #26373
    area-drawing, p/0, .NET 9 SR5
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 13330: Build ID 11023072 #27789
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 4 #27561
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 9 #27743
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 10 #27751
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 11 #27764
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] Apply Shell.TitleColor to toolbar items #24985
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 SR5
